channel.title: [RS2HD] 562/659 Disconnect in combat bug
channel.description:
Hi people! I've been working with one of my old 562/659 source lately. I noticed that I get randomly disconnected and client close instantly while I get attacked by npcs. It also DC me sometimes when I attack npcs. Would anyone be able to clear things of have any ideas on what it could be?
If you need anything, just ask!
Thanks in advance, Alex.

item.title: [RS2HD] 562/659 Disconnect in combat bug
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“godzskillz, post:3, topic:555058”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=673983.msg4506132#msg4506132 date=1458936933]
Are there any error messages in the server?

It sounds like some packets aren’t being sent right… at the minimal
[/quote]

No nothing If i train on rock crabs, nothing happens. Same with a few other low npc. If it’s a boss, I get DC almost instantly.[/quote]
So now you get to check what’s different between the bosses and rock crabs.

Can check some things like animations, for one.

Read full topic
